text: Kayamatako jnana usaitira pherincha! Ra juna phala aphna kosabata niskanchan ra juna mahila garbhavati hunchin ra juna bacca janma'umchin, usala'i yi sabaiko jnana huncha. Ra junadina usale yi musrikaharula'i bola'era sodhne cha, ‘‘kaham chan mera sajhedaraharu?’’ Uniharule bhannechan ki ‘‘hamile ta timila'i spastarupale bhanisakeka chaum ki hamimadhye kohi pani yasako saksi chaina.’’
